E

ExceptionHandlingReceiver - Class in info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.exception_handling_receivers
Base class for implementations of IMessageReceiver that may be used as parts of exceptional chains to handle exceptions.

I

info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.exception_handling_receivers - package info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.exception_handling_receivers
Contains some implementations of IMessageReceiver useful to build chains that will handle exceptions.

R

RetryingToTakeResourceExceptionHandler - Class in info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.exception_handling_receivers
This handler should be set in chin handling OutOfResourceException.

S

SkipReceiverExceptionHandler - Class in info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.exception_handling_receivers
Receiver that (when placed in exceptional chain) skips the receiver that has thrown an exception.
